mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inspect_item ( location_result, location_corrector, location_retest, phase_sequence_result, phase_sequence_corrector, phase_sequence_retest, secondary_element_result, secondary_element_corrector, secondary_element_retest, light_result, light_corrector, light_retest, meter_show_result, meter_show_corrector, meter_show_retest, meter_param_result, meter_param_corrector, meter_param_retest, signal_result, signal_corrector, signal_retest, electric_linkage_result, electric_linkage_corrector, electric_linkage_retest, cable_interlock_result, cable_interlock_corrector, cable_interlock_retest, all_function_result, all_function_corrector, all_function_retest, power_controller_result, power_controller_corrector, power_controller_retest, switch_result, switch_corrector, switch_retest, fan_temperature_result, fan_temperature_corrector, fan_temperature_retest, arrester_result, arrester_corrector, arrester_retest, door_land_result, door_land_corrector, door_land_retest, element_land_result, element_land_corrector, element_land_retest, special_point_result, special_point_corrector, special_point_retest, blot_result, blot_corrector, blot_retest, sundries_result, sundries_corrector, sundries_retest, gmt_created, gmt_modified ) VALUES ( #{locationResult}, #{locationCorrector}, #{locationRetest}, #{phaseSequenceResult}, #{phaseSequenceCorrector}, #{phaseSequenceRetest}, #{secondaryElementResult}, #{secondaryElementCorrector}, #{secondaryElementRetest}, #{lightResult}, #{lightCorrector}, #{lightRetest}, #{meterShowResult}, #{meterShowCorrector}, #{meterShowRetest}, #{meterParamResult}, #{meterParamCorrector}, #{meterParamRetest}, #{signalResult}, #{signalCorrector}, #{signalRetest}, #{electricLinkageResult}, #{electricLinkageCorrector}, #{electricLinkageRetest}, #{cableInterlockResult}, #{cableInterlockCorrector}, #{cableInterlockRetest}, #{allFunctionResult}, #{allFunctionCorrector}, #{allFunctionRetest}, #{powerControllerResult}, #{powerControllerCorrector}, #{powerControllerRetest}, #{switchResult}, #{switchCorrector}, #{switchRetest}, #{fanTemperatureResult}, #{fanTemperatureCorrector}, #{fanTemperatureRetest}, #{arresterResult}, #{arresterCorrector}, #{arresterRetest}, #{doorLandResult}, #{doorLandCorrector}, #{doorLandRetest}, #{elementLandResult}, #{elementLandCorrector}, #{elementLandRetest}, #{specialPointResult}, #{specialPointCorrector}, #{specialPointRetest}, #{blotResult}, #{blotCorrector}, #{blotRetest}, #{sundriesResult}, #{sundriesCorrector}, #{sundriesRetest}, now(), now() )
